import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useLocation,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";var Notificationpop=function Notificationpop(){var _useLocation=useLocation(),search=_useLocation.search;var navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(function(){console.log("Notificationpop component rendered.");// Use URLSearchParams to extract query parameters
var params=new URLSearchParams(search);var paramValue=params.get("paramt");console.log("paramValue:",paramValue);if(paramValue){// Decode the URL parameter
var decodedUrl=decodeURIComponent(paramValue);console.log("decodedUrl:",decodedUrl);// Redirect to another website
window.location.href=decodedUrl;}},[search,navigate]);return null;};export default Notificationpop;
